辳字的基本解释

辳
nóng
同“农”。

辳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nóng］
［《廣韻》奴冬切，平冬，泥。］
“农1”的繁体字。“莀2”的今字。“辳1”的今字。
(1)耕种。
(2)谓屯垦。
(3)农夫，农民。
(4)农事；农业。
(5)农神。古代蜡祭八神名之一。
(6)农家的简称。九流之一。
(7)厚。
(8)勤勉。
(9)古代的农官。
(10)指神农氏。

辳字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辰字部】　辳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1253第05
【玉篇】古文農字。註詳六畫。

[①]［nóng］
["Guangyun" Nudong cut, Pingdong, mud. ]
Traditional characters for "农1". The present character of "莀2". The modern word for "Nong 1".
(1) Farming.
(2) It is said that the land reclamation.
(3) Farmers, farmers.
(4) Agriculture; agriculture.
(5) The god of agriculture. One of the ancient wax festival Iori names.
(6) Abbreviation for farmhouse. One of the nine streams.
(7) Thick.
(8) Diligence.
(9) Ancient agricultural officials.
(10) Refers to Shennong's.
